Entries.cc_Bus: The bus is finally back in service, and we can go to the desert! Have you met my friend Sandy yet?$h#$e#I'm also glad that Pam got her old job back.$h
Entries.Tue2: Leah comes into the saloon sometimes. You should go ahead and talk to her.#$e#She's a real sweetheart.
Entries.Tue10: Hey, @.$l#$b#%*kiss*#$b#You don't mind if I do that, do you? Physical touch is really important to me.$l
Entries.Wed2: I like sleeping in when I can. I stay out pretty late on nights that I work, so it's just a routine I've fallen into.
Entries.Thu2: I'm sorry, you must miss your grandfather so much.$u#$b#But once a soul comes into existence, there's no reason why it has to go away completely. I'm sure you'll see him again soon.
Entries.Thu8: Dancing is important to me, but I have no plans to dance for a big audience.#$e#It helps me to connect with the physical energy of the world around me.#$b#And if I share that connection with a handful of close friends, that makes it really special for me.
Entries.Fri2: Friday nights at the saloon are a lot of fun. It's good to get into a sense of flow when the speed picks up.
Entries.Fri4: The flowers are really alive out there! I look out at the grassy fields and I see a sea of souls, shifting and mingling.#$e#It's beautiful to be a part of it all.
Entries.Fri6: We have to remember that everyone is connected to everyone and everything else.#$b#The happiness you share today will make ripples across time for hundreds of years.
Entries.Fri8: It's always important to spread goodness, but we also have to remember that everyone is on a different journey.#$b#In my view, there's never any room for judging someone else for their situation.#$e#Just love others, right? That's what it's all about.
Entries.Fri10: I don't think anyone will be suspicious if they see me kissing you. Everyone knows I'm the touchy-feely type.#$e#Oh?#$b#%*kiss*#$b#Heehee...$h
Entries.Sat2: Clothing is the gateway between your body and the world that surrounds you.#$b#I like to make clothing that connects me harmoniously with the day's experiences.
Entries.Sat4: I've experimented with making my own dyes from materials that come from around here.#$e#Synthetic dyes just don't work on your skin the same way natural ones do.
Entries.Sat8: In a way, Yoba plays an important role in my life, but I believe her presence goes beyond anything we can comprehend.#$b#Who knows? Maybe she isn't even a 'she.'
Entries.Sun6: I think it's neat how my parents learned to do what makes them happy.#$e#I do miss them, but it isn't really that different from anyone who moves out when they reach adulthood.#$b#For Haley and me, it's just the reverse.
Entries.Sun8: I can't shirk my responsibilities to this town, to the house, to Haley...$u#$b#My parents are abroad, where they need to be, but I'm also here, where I need to be, so...
Entries.Sun10: @, you're very special to me. You know that, right?$u#$e#Everyone and everything around me is also special, but you... I can't seem to stop thinking about you...$u#$e#...Come what may, I felt compelled to tell you that.$u
Entries.summer_Mon6: I don't completely buy into the idea of the 'self.'#$b#It makes much more sense to me that all of existence is one divine presence, and we are merely ripples upon it.
Entries.summer_Mon10: @, hold on a sec.$l#$b#%*kiss*#$b#...$l#$b#Have a wonderful day!$l
Entries.summer_Tue2: It's another workout day today. I love waking up all those dormant muscles in my body!
Entries.summer_Tue4: There are some great spots to go camping around here. Is that your thing, very much?
Entries.summer_Wed4: I gave my friend Sandy a call earlier today. Sounds like it's pretty lonely out in the desert.$u#$e#I believe everyone is always where they need to be, but we'll see if the universe provides another path for her.$u
Entries.summer_Wed8: Have you talked to the birds lately?#$b#...It's important to remember that we have so much more in common than you think.
Entries.summer_Wed10: @... do you think we're... destined for more than just our day-to-day conversations?$l
Entries.summer_Thu4: I feel guided to take more risks, lately.#$q 040/041/042 summer_Thu_old#So, @, do you believe in fate?#$r 040 0 Thu_040#No, we control our lives.#$r 041 0 Thu_041#Yes, there's no such thing as choice.#$r 042 10 Thu_042#I'm not sure.
Entries.summer_Thu_old: $p 042#I still have to listen carefully to the conscience that the universe gifts to us, though.|I still have to listen carefully to the conscience that the universe communicates to us, though.
Entries.Thu_040: I've thought that, too, but what if I'd been born with a different brain? Would I have made the same choices?#$b#And could I still call those choices my own, if it was pure luck that I got that brain?
Entries.Thu_041: Right? I can't deny that we only make our 'choices' because of preexisting influences.#$b#That's why I can't ever judge someone for the situation they're in.
Entries.Thu_042: Hey, maybe that's the best way to be! There's so much to wonder at in the universe.
Entries.summer_Thu8: We're just standing here, but the universe has brought us to this exact moment!$h#$b#It's absolutely amazing if you stop and think about it.
Entries.summer_Sat4: We should always treat one another with not just respect, but love, too.#$e#I try to treat everyone the same. Sandy, Clint, Shane, you... everyone.#$e#Because you're all wonderful in your own ways!$h
Entries.summer_Sat8: My sewing machine's been getting a good workout this summer. I just have so many projects.#$e#I'll maybe get around to making something for Haley, but I also have to accept there's a good chance she'll never wear it.$u#$b#Oh well. *shrug*
Entries.summer_Sat10: I want to love everyone equally, @, but I can't deny that what I feel for you is... a little deeper.$u#$e#Do you think you'll live here a long time?$u
Entries.summer_Sun6: Hi, @! We've become decent friends, haven't we?$h#$e#That's fine with me. You're a cool guy.^I'm glad.$h
Entries.summer_Sun8: Hi, @! We've become decent friends, haven't we?$h#$e#This may sound weird, but I've always been certain this would happen.
Entries.summer_Sun10: Souls swirl together like clouds forming and reshaping in the sky. I'm glad we've crossed paths as we have, @.$l
Entries.fall_Mon4: I've been working on some sweaters for when the days get colder.#$e#My goal is for the fabric to create a warm, nostalgic feeling for whoever wears it.
Entries.fall_Tue8: Everyone has something to contribute to this world. Whether it's big or small makes no difference.
Entries.fall_Tue10: In a way, Yoba plays an important role in my life, but I believe her presence goes beyond anything we can comprehend.#$b#Who knows? Maybe she isn't even a 'she.'
Entries.fall_Wed2: One place where I put my foot down is with salmon. No other creature labors like they do to fulfill their purpose.$s#$e#If you catch one, I hope you'll toss it back.$s
Entries.fall_Wed8: I wish Gus wouldn't make his salmon dinner recipe. If we aren't careful, we'll run the world clean out of salmon.$s
Entries.fall_Thu2: I saw a little family of mushrooms living under one of the trees in town.$l#$e#Cutest thing ever!$h
Entries.fall_Thu4: I practice transcendental meditation. It's very important, I think, to get in touch with the part of the world we cannot see.
Entries.fall_Thu8: I hope I get a chance to visit the desert again soon. I've got to see Sandy, of course, but...#$b#...there's also a trader whose wares are just amazing.#$e#Be sure to bring some gems with you for trading, if you go.
Entries.fall_Fri4: Smell that clean air? It's lovely, isn't it?#$b#I just fear that the Joja Co.'s of the world will take this away from us.$u
Entries.fall_Fri8: Life can't last for all time, so we have to make sure we embrace every day!#$b#But also, what IS 'time,' anyway?
Entries.fall_Fri10: It's okay for me if people see us kiss. Everyone in town knows I'm the touchy-feely type.#$e#Oh?#$b#%*kiss*#$b#Heehee...$h
Entries.fall_Sat4: I don't have any huge plans for life. I prefer not to stress about the future.
Entries.fall_Sat8: There's good people in this town who just can't seem to find happiness. It makes me sad.$u#$e#Working in the saloon, I hear first-hand about everyone's problems.$u
Entries.fall_Sat10: Hi @.$l#$e#My heart rate picked up as soon as I saw you. Here, put your hand on my chest.$l#$e#I'm so glad you came by!
Entries.fall_Sun4: There are so many invisible barriers holding us back. Why can't people learn to let go and celebrate freedom?#$e#Me? Well, you know what they say... 'You can't cage a wild Junimo'.
Entries.fall_Sun8: You're such a nice person, @! Thanks for being my friend.$h
Entries.fall_Sun10: You're such a nice person, @! Thanks for being good to me.$h
Entries.winter_Mon2: Every now and then, I get a craving for a good vegan burger.#$e#I'm not actually vegan, or vegetarian. I just eat whatever feels most nourishing for my body and spirit.
Entries.winter_Mon4: With the weather as cold as it is, I've been working on a sweater for Shane.#$e#I think he'll like it. It's not too heavy, so it should fit nicely under his favorite hoodie.
Entries.winter_Mon8: Be careful an icicle doesn't fall on your head! I wouldn't want you to get hurt!
Entries.winter_Mon10: @, hold on a sec.$l#$b#%*kiss*#$b#...$h#$b#Have a wonderful day!$h
Entries.winter_Tue6: We can all use a little more dancing in our lives, don't you think?#$e#In a way, all of life is a dance. It's just a matter of how well aware your physicality recognizes that.
Entries.winter_Tue8: I hope we all can learn to age as well as the changing of the seasons into winter.
Entries.winter_Wed: I wish Haley would get a job or at least contribute to cooking and cleaning.$s#$e#I think she's hoping to marry someone rich.$u
Entries.winter_Wed2: I really wish Haley would pitch in more with keeping the house clean.#$e#Ah well. I just wish we all could learn to accept the responsibilities that are laid before us.
Entries.winter_Wed4: The last time I visited Calico Desert, I came across a merchant with a camel. She had so many beautiful things for sale, it almost took my breath away.#$e#Next time I go, I'll have to bring some of my gem collection for trading. She doesn't accept G.
Entries.winter_Wed6: Haley and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.#$e#Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy.$h
Entries.winter_Wed8: I do wonder sometimes where Haley will end up.$u#$e#I'm sure she'll wind up exactly where she needs to be.
Entries.winter_Wed10: Sometimes it feels like I have to be a parent to Haley. But that's not a role I can really fill...$u
Entries.winter_Wed_inlaw_Haley: I'm so happy that Haley found you. The universe had a plan for her after all!$h
Entries.winter_Thu4: It's free hug day today!$h#$b#%*hug*#$b#I hope your day goes wonderfully!$h
Entries.winter_Thu10: You look like you could use a little human connection.$h#$b#%*kiss*#$b#Touch is important. I wish more people were open about it.$h
Entries.winter_Fri2: Crystals hold various potent properties. Some of them can serve as a nexus for spiritual connections with others.#$e#Clint's big into crystals, too. That's probably why we're such good friends.$h
Entries.winter_Fri6: If I wasn't so busy I'd help you dig around in that cave by the lake.#$e#I bet there are some powerful crystals inside there.
Entries.winter_Fri8: It isn't always easy trying to show love and compassion for everyone.#$e#What if the love I show for one person hurts someone else?$s
Entries.winter_Sat6: The world around us is sleeping, but the spirits are still very much alive.#$e#You can hear the spirits if you know how to listen with more than just your ears...
Entries.winter_Sat8: Life can't last for all time, so we have to make sure we embrace every day!#$b#But also, what IS 'time,' anyway?
Entries.winter_Sun2: My homemade sweaters have been really cozy in this cold weather.
Entries.winter_Sun6: There were some huge snowflakes outside the other night!#$e#Sometimes, I really enjoy walking home late at night.
Entries.winter_Sun8: My sister and I might fight sometimes, but I would really miss her if she left.#$e#I think she'll become a very nice young lady some day... Don't tell her I said that.$h#$e#So, is there anything you want to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun8_inlaw_Haley: Say hi to my sister for me! And remind her to visit me tomorrow.
Entries.winter_Sun10: The spiritual connection that I feel to you... do you feel it too?$l#$b#It's like a million invisible threads connecting the two of us.$l#$e#...No?#$b#%*kiss*#$b#How about now?
Entries.spring_1_2: Where will fate lead us this year? I'm eager to find out.$h
Entries.spring_23: Who will I dance with tomorrow at the festival? Wherever my presence is needed the most, that's where I'll end up!
Entries.summer_10: Hey, look for me tomorrow at the luau. I'll greet you, but probably not in the way you're used to.
Entries.summer_27: The moonlight jellies will be here soon. As people, we have so much we can learn from them.$l
Entries.fall_15: I'm looking forward to the crowds at the fair tomorrow. There will be so many interesting people to meet!
Entries.fall_26: Gus has some pretty tasty treats that he's been prepping for Spirit's Eve. Be sure to say hi!
Entries.winter_9: Those poor fish! I hope Mayor Lewis was responsible with them after yesterday's competition.$s
Entries.winter_24: It's been a whirlwind at work lately.#$b#Gus has been in high gear with all the food he's been cooking for the feast!
Entries.spring_23_2: Who will I dance with tomorrow at the festival? Wherever my presence is needed the most, that's where I'll end up!
Entries.summer_10_2: Hey, look for me tomorrow at the luau. I'll greet you, but probably not in the way you're used to.
Entries.summer_27_2: The moonlight jellies will be here soon. As people, we have so much we can learn from them.$l
Entries.fall_15_2: Tomorrow will be a good day for people watching. What are your plans for the fair?
Entries.fall_26_2: Gus has some pretty tasty treats that he's been prepping for Spirit's Eve. Be sure to say hi!
Entries.winter_9_2: Those poor fish! I hope Mayor Lewis was responsible with them after yesterday's competition.$s
Entries.winter_24_2: It's been a whirlwind at work lately.#$b#Gus has been in high gear with all the food he's been cooking for the feast!

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: #$c .5#I wonder where the flying insects go when it rains? Don't they get hit by the raindrops?#I hope all the animals out there are taking shelter. Maybe they're all sleeping in.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: #$c .5#A day like this is a blessing from mother nature.#When one raindrop falls on your head, how many times do you think its water molecules have been in the sky before?
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: #$c .5#Good morning... I got this gift for you. Don't worry, I already purified it with sage incense. [428 440 444 338 207]#It's pretty wet out there, isn't it? Here, this item will keep you well. [428 440 444 338 207]
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: #$c .5#I meant to let the parrot go free, but his wing never fully healed. He seems content, though. I give him lots of attention.#The parrot seems to enjoy living inside, especially on days like these. He told me that he's happy here.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: #$c .5#I never told you this... but when you first moved here I had a dream about you. I knew right then that our life-paths would intertwine.$4#I've already forgotten last night's dreams. How strange. They were crystal clear when I first awoke.$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: #$c .5#Every moment has a unique and precious beauty... do you notice? It can be easy to forget, sometimes.#It's important to find something to love about each day. For me today, it was watching the fields dance to the rain in the afternoon.
Entries.patio_Emily: #$c .5#This is my favorite spot for a morning meditation. I visualize the energy from this crystal garden flowing through my body.#%Emily is in a deep meditative state.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: #$c .5#I can hear the plants talking to each other... they're so happy after today's rain!#Does the weather have you feeling down? I wonder if a little clothing therapy would help?
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: #$c .5#How was your day? You look a little soggy.#Did you get everything done that you'd hoped? Don't worry if you didn't. Each day is special, even if it isn't what we planned.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: #$c .5#My day was very peaceful. How was yours?#I wonder if the animals enjoy cuddling up together on a night like this.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: #$c .5#Want some dessert? It's my special raw, gluten-free version, sweetened only with cactus syrup.[232 234 223 220]$h#I made you a treat! Sandy sent me the agave nectar that I used in it. [232 234 223 220]$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: #$c .5#Does the sound of rain ever put you in a trance?#I feel like our souls are especially in step tonight. Maybe we can head to bed a little early?$l
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: #$c .5#What physical objects do you feel especially connected to today? Be sure not to overlook them.#Another beautiful day on %farm farm... I have faith that something good will happen today!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: #$c .5#Here, take this. It's for you. [428 440 444 338 207 395 749]#I've been saving this for a special occasion. Today seems like the right day. [428 440 444 338 207 395 749]
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: #$c .5#Hey, someone must've gotten a good night of sleep... you look fresh this morning.$h#One day, we'll all wake up from this life, as if from a pleasant sleep. But for now and many years, I just want to enjoy this dream.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: #$c .5#My horoscope for the day isn't too good... but I'm going to make the best of it, as always. Let's get to work!#I wonder what Haley's doing today? I hope she has something planned.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: #$c .5#Ughh... *gurgle*... I ate too many bran muffins for breakfast.$s#Good morning! Give me a kiss before you go.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: #$c .5#Is that a new hole I see in your shirt? I can sew that up for you, no problem.#I danced a little while you were out. It always helps bring me back in touch with reality.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: #$c .5#Welcome home. I hope you had a wonderful day.#Welcome home. I love the way you look at me like that.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: #$c .5#Is it bed time already? My, the day just floated away from me again.$u#I just got off the phone with Sandy. Sounds like she had a great time visiting Zuzu City not too long ago.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: #$c .5#Ah, that aroma! It can only be you. It's a good smell.$h#I feel so comforted, the split-second I hear your footsteps land on the deck.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: #$c .5#I swept the whole house, washed the windows, dusted, and cleaned the fridge. It was a very productive day!#Maybe someday when we retire, we can travel the world, like my parents. At least just for a little bit.$u
Entries.Outdoor_0: #$c .5#I love getting up early. There's a certain freshness to the air and the wildlife is much more active.#Shh, if you pause and listen very carefully, you can hear the ocean.
Entries.Outdoor_1: #$c .5#What's on the agenda today, dear?#If you need a break later today, you can meditate over at the crystal garden. There's no wrong way how to do it.
Entries.Outdoor_3: #$c .5#A little sunlight is good for you. Just don't get crispy, okay?#There's so much to do today! Not in the stressful sense, but just in the 'appreciation' way.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Good morning! I was wondering when you'd finally roll out of bed!$h#$e#$c .5#I was hoping you wouldn't miss this beautiful morning.#It's okay... you deserve a good night of rest.
Entries.OneKid_0: #$c .5#I hope we can raise our child to be kind and considerate. That's more important than getting A's in school.#Little %kid1 will probably grow up to like vegetables if we set a good example. What do you think?
Entries.OneKid_1: #$c .5#Is one child enough, or should we raise another? I guess we'll just see where fate leads us.#To think... if you'd never felt upset at your old job, you never would've moved here, we'd have never met, and %kid1 wouldn't even exist.$l
Entries.OneKid_3: #$c .5#I lit a pale green candle and shook a sprig of baby-mint over our little one. That should ward off any dangerous spirits.#I love %kid1's cute little baby noises.$h
Entries.TwoKids_1: #$c .5#A big house, two kids and a parrot... I have my hands full!#Yoba has blessed our home so much! We have that much more responsibility to show love and support to others.
Entries.TwoKids_2: #$c .5#I hope the parrot doesn't feel neglected, but I have to admit that these kids keep my hands more than full.$s#Well, %kid2 certainly has your hair...$u
Entries.TwoKids_3: #$c .5#Oh, I already fed the kids their organic quinoa puffs with goat milk. You just focus on the farm!#I forgot to tell you, the kids loved seeing their Aunt Haley yesterday. She stopped by.
Entries.funLeave_Emily: #$c .5#I'm going to visit town today, and later on I'm going to help out at the saloon. Have a nice day.#Gus rang. Said he had some work for me, so that's where I'll be later today if you need me.
Entries.funReturn_Emily: #$c .5#My day went well... it's good to get out of the house now and then.#What a wonderful day today! It was nice to take a stroll through Pelican Town.$h
Entries.spring_14: The farm must seem like an endless expanse to the bugs and worms. It's an entire world, really.#$e#When I think about people standing all over the planet, we're just like the bugs who only know the farm. What lies beyond?#$e#Everything is relative. It's just a matter of perspective.
Entries.spring_19: It's Friday! Are you going to have a night out, or are you going to stay in?
Entries.spring_27: The parrot sang me a little song right before you got up. Did you hear it, or were you still out?
Entries.summer_7: I'll never forget that bear that showed up on our camping trip.#$b#Nor the part that came after that.$l
Entries.summer_12: I hope I didn't go overboard with the dancing yesterday. I'm thirstier today than I expected.$u#$e#Oh, of course I noticed you. My eyes were closed, but I heard your footsteps and felt your presence.
Entries.summer_18: Do we have any structures that could be temporarily repurposed as a sweat-lodge? It's just a thought I had.
Entries.summer_22: I know some people might be a little put-off by the things I believe and the way I act. But it's just the way I am.$u#$e#I don't know how to be myself any other way.
Entries.summer_26: Today is 'Do Something Nice for a Random Person' Day. Maybe I'll pay for Clint's burger tonight at the Saloon.#$e#Anyone in mind whose day you'd like to brighten?
Entries.fall_4: *sigh*... Salmon season.$s#$e#I hope as many as possible complete their long upstream journey.$s
Entries.fall_7: Mmm, maybe we can make it survival burger night, tonight?#$e#I've just got a craving.
Entries.fall_10: Are you going down into the mines any time soon? I know that Yoba will protect you, but it doesn't hurt to be vigilant on your end, too.$u
Entries.fall_14: When my feelings for you first developed, I secretly feared I'd lose my passion for loving the world around me...$u#$b#...that all my love was diverted into you.$u#$b#But now, I can see it's not a problem at all. The bond I share with you just spurs me on, to love everyone and everything even more!#$e#...$l
Entries.fall_20: The spirits are really active this time of year. Stand by the trees in the forest, and you can hear more than just the wind whispering through.
Entries.winter_10: You know, I noticed that Haley's keeping the house in pretty good shape!#$e#Who knew that all I had to do was move out, and she'd suddenly step it up?$h
Entries.winter_22: @, I just wanted to say, as long as we've known each other, you've never tried to change me from the person I am.$u#$b#I know... a lot of people don't really understand me, and possibly sometimes I do things that even confuse you a little, too...$u#$b#...But you've always accepted me.$u#$e#So... thank you.$u
Entries.winter_16: I hope Shane and Clint are doing okay. I don't see them as much as I used to.$u
